description: Numerators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(101).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (20,1).
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[(10 + x)/(1 - 20 x - x^2), {x, 0, 30}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Oct 30 2013 *)Numerator[Convergents[Sqrt[101], 20]] (* _Bruno Berselli_, Oct 30 2013 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
